Package com.naturo.kata.yatzy

Class DiceRoll

java.lang.Object
com.naturo.kata.yatzy.DiceRoll
public class DiceRoll extends Object
Realize combinations of dice roll results, based on Yatzy Rule from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yatzy
Author:
HOANG Nha Thu

    • DiceRoll

      public DiceRoll(int dice1, int dice2, int dice3, int dice4, int dice5)
      DiceRoll constructor initiate two work lists
      Parameters:
      dice1 - number of first dice roll
      dice2 - number of second dice roll
      dice3 - number of third dice roll
      dice4 - number of fourth dice roll
      dice5 - number of fifth dice roll

      Parameters:
      faceDice - dice number
      Returns:
      number occur * dice number

    • getOccurenceOfKind

      public int getOccurenceOfKind(int occurrence)
      Find dice number associate to the occurrence in parameter
      Parameters:
      occurrence - number rolling with same face dice
      Returns:
      dice number associated this occurrence, -1 if not found

    • isYatzy

      public boolean isYatzy()
      Check if all five dice rolls show the same number
      Returns:
      true when found 5 from list of numbers occurrence

    • isSmallStraight

      public boolean isSmallStraight()
      Check Small straight : The combination 1-2-3-4-5
      Returns:
      true for smallStraight else false

    • isLargeStraight

      public boolean isLargeStraight()
      Check Large straight: The combination 2-3-4-5-6
      Returns:
      true for largeStraight else false

    • isFullHouse

      public boolean isFullHouse()
      Check fullHouse : Any set of three combined with a different pair if any pair with any other three-of-a-kind
      Returns:
      true for FullHouse else false
